CustomField.description: CC BWRD Customer Pain Point Weighted Score Auto
CustomField.formula: CASE( Customer_Pain_Point__c, '(1) Not Painful', 1 * Customer_Pain_Point_Weight__c, '(2) Somewhat Painful', 2 * Customer_Pain_Point_Weight__c, '(3) Painful', 3 * Customer_Pain_Point_Weight__c, '(4) Really Painful', 4 * Customer_Pain_Point_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Customer Pain Point Weighted Score
